overview: A tough police sergeant's mother comes to visit him, and promptly starts trying to fix up his life, much to his embarrassment. For his birthday she buys him a machine gun out of the back of a van, and begins to further interfere with his job and love life, eventually helping him with a case he's on.
original_title: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
tagline: She did the laundry and washed the dishes. Now she's cleaning up the streets.
cast: Sylvester Stallone|Estelle Getty|JoBeth Williams|Roger Rees|Martin Ferrero
